title: Cancel transaction
name: CancelRequest
description: This method attempts to cancel the current transaction on the card reader. Note that operations cannot be cancelled at certain points during the transaction process

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This parameter specifies to the system which device you want to use for the operations. If none is supplied the system will attempt to use a default device, if any.

elements.name: currentTransactionStatus
elements.description: Invoked during a transaction, it fetches statuses coming from the card reader (ex : 'waiting for card' or 'waiting for PIN entry')

elements.name: endOfTransaction
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device
